version_description: Giving credit where credit’s due. Now, when you tag your image #freetoedit your username will appear on all of its Remixes. Get ready to be #freetoedit-famous.

The next time you tap on the start button to start making something awesome, you might notice some changes. We’ve rethought your creative process a bit, and made it sleeker, slicker and definitely smoother. And the camera has a new look too! Think of it as one big red carpet for your awesome pictures.
Bug fixes. Life changing, awe-inspiring bug fixes.
Give your eyes an infusion of color with the new Prism Effect! Curious? Update the app to see it in action.
Give your eyes an infusion of color with the new Prism Effect! Curious? Update the app to see it in action.
This release is *abuzz* with bug fixes.
This release is *abuzz* with bug fixes.
Bug fixes! Bug fixes! Bug fixes galore!
Bug fixes! Bug fixes! Bug fixes galore!
Bug fixes! Bug fixes! Bug fixes galore!
Bug fixes! Bug fixes! Bug fixes galore!
Bug fixes, performance improvements — nothing less, nothing more.

Stickers just got REAL. You can now create your own stickers and share them with your friends in Remix Chat and on your profile. AND you can use your friends’ stickers too! ALL of them. Take a moment to let that sink in.

What’s the point of sending a sticker to your friends if you can’t have a little fun with it? Our thoughts exactly. Now you can remix stickers directly from Remix Chat, and see all of the stickers and images in the chat with the new quick gallery view. So go ahead and update the app. Re-mix things up a little.

What’s the point of sending a sticker to your friends if you can’t have a little fun with it? Our thoughts exactly. Now you can remix stickers directly from Remix Chat, and see all of the stickers and images in the chat with the new quick gallery view. So go ahead and update the app. Re-mix things up a little.
Bug fixes! Bug fixes! Bug fixes galore!
We’re officially the ONLY app with a Dispersion Tool. You can now disperse yourself with just one tap!  Check it out.
Have you seen our NEW Daily Sticker Remix? It’s our new favorite way to remix stickers, make awesome pictures and stay inspired all day, every day.

But seriously, have you SEEN the new Dispersion Tool? Everyone’s talking about it because it lets you make customized dispersion edits in just a few seconds. And PicsArt’s the only place you’ll find it.
Just a little spring cleaning this time around.

Now you can add LIVE stickers while you’re using the camera! We also wanted to make it easier for you to blend stickers in your edits, so now you can edit them with Effects and the Adjust Tool before applying them. And have you seen your redesigned profile? You’re gonna want to take a look.
Have you tried out our new LIVE stickers? If you haven’t, you’re missing out. It’s a totally new way to take selfies. Open your PicsArt Camera to see LIVE stickers in action!
Everyone loves the Dispersion Tool, so we decided to make it even better. Now you can brush off the effect so you have more control over your edit. Update the app to give it a try!

Have you heard? We officially have ONE MILLION custom community stickers for you to use in your edits, as live stickers in the camera, and on your favorite messaging apps. Oh, and did we mention that every single one is FREE?
Searching for stickers? We’ve got over 1 MILLION of them (and counting!). Find them all for FREE on PicsArt.

Looking for something specific? Be sure to check out our improved search! We’ve integrated Bing image search so you can find exactly what you’re looking for. Also, now you can choose your favorite watermark when you’re showing off your edits on Instagram.
Go off the grid with FREESTYLE collages! No template. No restrictions. Give it a try for limitless creativity.
Have you seen Remix Reel? It’s a whole new space for you to find inspiration, and it’s waiting for you on your feed. Go check it out!
Check out the new PicsArt Stickers iMessage app. You can quickly search all 2,000,000+ FREE community stickers, or create your own to send to friends!

Wish you could use all of PicsArt’s #FreeToEdit stickers on iMessage? Well now you can with PicsArt for iMessage. You can also create awesome collages with all of your backgrounds, photos and stickers with our new Freestyle Collage option!

Your stickers are about to get a lot more COLORFUL, because you can now add a border in any color to any sticker! Find the new Border feature in the stickers menu — it’s a whole new way to edit with stickers.

Your stickers are about to get a lot more COLORFUL, because you can now add a border in any color to any sticker! Find the new Border feature in the stickers menu — it’s a whole new way to edit with stickers.

Your stickers are about to get a lot more COLORFUL, because you can now add a border in any color to any sticker! Find the new Border feature in the stickers menu — it’s a whole new way to edit with stickers.

Your stickers are about to get a lot more COLORFUL, because you can now add a border in any color to any sticker! Find the new Border feature in the stickers menu — it’s a whole new way to edit with stickers.

Your stickers are about to get a lot more COLORFUL, because you can now add a border in any color to any sticker! Find the new Border feature in the stickers menu — it’s a whole new way to edit with stickers.

Our new AI-powered Portrait Selection automatically detects and selects people in pictures, so you don’t have to! Now you can change the background in photos and turn people into stickers with literally ONE tap.
If you haven’t tried out the new SCENES in the PicsArt camera, you’re missing out! Put yourself in the clouds or among the stars with just one tap. It’s a whole new way to take awesome selfies.
If you haven’t tried out the new SCENES in the PicsArt camera, you’re missing out! Put yourself in the clouds or among the stars with just one tap. It’s a whole new way to take awesome selfies.
Bug fixes! Bug fixes! Bug fixes galore!

Have you *scene* our new SCENES? We’ve redesigned the PicsArt camera and filled it with scenes with different themes — including pizza, fruit, holograms, galaxies, cupcakes and more. Try it with your friends to see how fun your selfies can be!
We’ve added an eraser to the Square Fit Tool, including one-tap portrait selection. This means that you can erase the background of a photo and add in a new one with just a few taps!
Have you participated in our NEW Challenges yet? They’re a great way to get creative and find inspiration. Head over to the Challenges section of the app to get started!
'Tis the season for NEW winter scenes! Try them out to give your selfies some seasonal flair!
Kick off the New Year with an amazing edit or an editing challenge! Try out our new stickers, frames & backgrounds or one of our favorite tools, Dispersion.
This is big! Try the new Brushes feature to quickly swipe on any free sticker or pattern, like hearts or sparkles. It's perfect for Valentine's Day.
This is big! Try the new Brushes feature to quickly swipe on any free sticker or pattern, like hearts or sparkles. It's perfect for Valentine's Day.
Try our new Brushes to make an easy edit by brushing on over 4 million free stickers or pattern. You'll seriously love it.
Turn your photos from drab to fab! Try one of our new Camera scenes or add a Brush for some extra flair.

Attack of the clones! With our improved Selection tool, you can auto-detect any person, cut them out, clone and edit with just a few taps. Plus! Curate and create collections of all your favorite images with our new and improved Collections feature.

Introducing PicsArt Gold! Subscribe for access to all premium content (over 3,000 items) and ad-free editing. Don’t mind ads? Don’t worry! You’ll still get all of our amazing photo editing features for free.
Create a special gift for Mother's Day, that she'll always remember, with our amazing editing tools and premium Mother's Day stickers.
Create a special Mother's Day gift that she'll love with our amazing editing tools and premium Mother's Day stickers, collages and frames.
Celebrate the moms and dads in your life with exclusive stickers, frames and collages for Mother's Day and Father's Day.

Use the volume button to snap a pic from Camera and then edit it using Beautify, our new and improved corrections tool, that will make any profile picture sparkle! Now improved with: face fix, detail enhancement, blemish fix, skin tone correction and eye & hair color changers.
Celebrate the Dads in your life with our premium stickers, frames and backgrounds for Father's Day + curate your profile feed with the ability to hide photos and save them to collections.

Get your sunblock ready, because these updates are hotter than the sun. Summer is here, and we have all of the packs you need for the perfect edit.

What’s New for Gold Members?

- 15+ Exclusive photo filters and custom fonts, just for subscribed users. There’s no better way to start beach season than with blush and bright tones, or by cooling off with some film vibes.

Try our glitchin' new brush, Glitch, for a serious dose of editing magic. With one swipe you can turn any image into the trendiest edit of the summer.

What's new for Gold members?
Say it with style! Find and save any font to PicsArt or create your own with our custom fonts feature, exclusively for Gold subscribers.

The first day of school is on the horizon and we have everything you need for your last summer sunset edit, to your perfect back to school portrait. Here’s what’s new:

Beautify 2.0 will transform your ordinary selfie into an extraordinary portrait. Check out the new and improved tool with auto-detection and manual correction.

PicsArt Gold Subscribers have premium access to our latest and greatest. Don’t miss out on:
Custom fonts
New Content
Exclusive Access to new fonts

The holidays are fast approaching, so here’s a small update to tide things over, till the New Year festivities truly kick in:
• Textured colors for Sketch Effects - SKTCH1 and SKTCH2 just received gradient, glitter, space, and other textures as an option for sketch line colors.

Don’t say goodbye to Summer just yet, PicsArtists. Create your best image edits before the leaves turn in the latest version of PicsArt!

Explore all of our new video tools and features with our new, cutting-edge video editor
PicsArt Gold Subscribers have premium access to exclusive fonts and brand new filters!
Bug fixes, performance improvements — nothing less, nothing more.

Summer’s almost over, and the season of oversized sweaters and pumpkin spiced-everything is upon us, along with some amazingly cool new PicsArt features. Here’s what is new and improved:

-We’ve partnered with Unsplash, one of the world’s leading photography communities, to bring you half a million new free-to-edit images!
-We’ve launched a NEW create flow, keeping things as easy as possible for you to work creative magic!
-You can now add your PicsArt masterpieces right into your Facebook and Instagram Stories
-PicsArt Gold Subscribers have premium access to exclusive fonts and new K-pop filters

The leaves are about to change and we’re FALLing hard for these new updates:

- Our new AR Camera is here! Create, save and share animated stickers of any moving person in IRL. Available for iPhone 6s and above, on iOS 11 and iPads: Pro 1st and 2nd gens (all sizes), iPad 2017
- The comments section got a makeover. Navigate comments easily, start threads, and edit your comments after they are posted.
- New and improved text wrapping tool
- Post your creations directly to Instagram as a post or story
- Exclusive new FLTRs and fonts for Gold subscribers

No hocus pocus here, just some autumn updates to get you PicsArt-ready for Halloween season, including our new gold and silver brushes.

What’s new for Gold subscribers?
Party like it’s 1995 with new Millennial FLTRs
Premium fall stickers and backgrounds

Ready to make that perfectly-spooky Halloween Edit? Not before checking out these new updates  

What’s new for Gold members?
 - Our new Sunday FLTRs are easy like...well, you know the rest.
 - All the stickers and backgrounds you need for the best Halloween edits

Cozy up with your PicsArt App and enjoy these new and improved features! 
- AR Camera now features a Shared AR experience, where you can create Live Rooms to share with nearby friends and enjoy personal 
content sharing.
- Bug fixes on our photo chooser
- Perfect the moment with Slideshow, and combine your images with nothing more than a tap of your finger.
- PicsArt Gold users will enjoy new, exclusive content and brand new FLTRs!

Post-Halloween Blues? Cheer up with these new and improved features on PicsArt! 
- Keep an eye out for the PicsArt blog, now accessible in-app with all the best tutorials. 
- PicsArt Gold users will enjoy new, exclusive content and brand new 1996  FLTRs!
Bug fixes. Minor performance improvements.

We’re Thankful for a whole bunch of new features, tools and updates.
- Introducing, Templates! Quickly create amazing edits in just a few steps with hundreds of templates for social posts, invitations, announcements and more.
- PicsArt Gold users will enjoy new, Thanksgiving packs, frames and scenes
- Stretch and Text wrapping tools are all fixed
Bug fixes. Minor performance improvements.

The Holidays are around the corner, and there are a bunch of new features waiting for you under the mistletoe!
- Our new font chooser is here, including premium font integration and localized Chinese and Arabic fonts!
- Beautify got a makeover! Enjoy improved hair color, skin color, and teeth whitening tools.
- PicsArt Gold users will enjoy new, Holiday packs, frames and scenes

Ready for the Holidays? Not without these new features and updates.
- New Holiday Templates are here!
- Look back on 2018 with our Slideshow tool, now available with Templates on iOS devices 6s and higher
- AR Camera now features animated stickers
- PicsArt Gold users will enjoy new, Holiday packs, frames and scenes
Bug fixes. Minor performance improvements.
Bug fixes. Life changing, awe-inspiring bug fixes.

New year, new updates! Kick off 2019 with these awesome improvements. 
- AR Camera updates - add any free-to-edit sticker to your AR Camera recording. 
- Selfie Stickers - give yourself a serious makeover with these sticker packs for hair, eyes, biceps, abs and more.

Love is in the air at PicsArt and these new updates will make you swoon! 
- New Valentine’s Day templates and live stickers are here! 
- Capture the perfect moment with our new Vday camera scenes 
- The new Pastel Paint Brush will give your edits a pop of color before spring
- Gold users check out our new Polaroid & Grunge filters for a throwback feel

This update is short and sweet!
•        Bug fixes and performance enhancements
•        Your AR Camera has the ability to delete multiple live stickers at the same time.

Spring has arrived at PicsArt:
•        New FLTR - Glitch2
•        New Templates for Spring, Carnaval, Mardi Gras, St. Patrick’s Day! 
•        Performance enhancements and optimization to our Clone tool

Say ‘see ya’ to winter blues because these updates are built for Spring:
- Performance enhancements to our Beautify tool to keep you gorgeous
- Aligning pictures in collages and canvases is now easier with rulers & snapping
What’s New for Gold Subscribers?

Say ‘see ya’ to winter blues because these updates are built for Spring:
- Performance enhancements to our Beautify tool to keep you gorgeous
- Aligning pictures in collages and canvases is now easier with rulers & snapping
What’s New for Gold Subscribers?

Hey Grads, celebrate your big day with a BIG edit!
- Performance enhancements and bug fixes!
Gold subscribers you’re going to love the improvements to our Video Editor. Now it’s easier than ever to select when added photos, stickers, and text appear in your video. Awesome, right?
Bug fixes, performance improvements — nothing less, nothing more.

This update is absolutely awesome:
- Introducing REPLAY! Easily recreate the awesome remixes you see on @Picsart by simply playing back the edit history and applying the steps to your images. Two new Replays added to @PicsArt daily! Awesome, right? 
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements 
What’s new for Gold Subscribers?
- All FLTRs, now available for Video Editor 
- New Graduation and Prom Templates

Summertime and the living ( & updates) are easy!
- Loving Replay? Remember new Replays will be released daily, so follow the @picsart account for the ultimate editing inspiration!
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements 
What’s new for Gold Subscribers?
- Share your moments in the sun with our new Summer Templates!

Summer Lovin’ we’re having a blast with these updates!
•   Bug Fixes and Performance Updates
•   Improved Face Tool in Beautify to keep you Cool for the Summer!

What’s New for Gold Subscribers?
•   Say thanks to dad with our new Templates for Father’s Day
•   Look for the new Action Effects in Video Editor!

We’re squashing bugs and improving performance so you can keep remixing all month long! We’ve also improved:
- Finding the perfect sticker will be easier than ever with our search improvements!

What’s New for Gold Subscribers?
- You can now add GIPHY stickers in Video Editor!

Say hello to Sketch Effect! It perfectly outlines any portrait or selfie adding a sophisticated & cool touch for your summer socials. Our favorite effect release of the year! 

•        Stay cool this summer with our new Ice Cube Brush!
•        Performance enhancements & bug fixes

What’s New for Gold Subscribers?

•        You get 3 more premium Sketch Effect filters! 
Huge improvements to our Beautification tool! New features that allow you to make adjustments to your facial features everything from your eyes to nose!
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Performance enhancements & bug fixes.
Big news for Replay! Now you can create a Replay and share it with followers, allowing your fans and friends to quickly recreate your edits in just a few taps.
Performance enhancements & bug fixes.

Get ready to FALL in love with this update:
 
•        Inspired by Taylor Swift’s new album "Lover" check out our new butterfly, star, and rainbow cloud brushes!
•        Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Performance enhancements and bug fixes!
Bug Fixes and Performance Updates

Halloween is fully underway! With it comes our update, which includes:
• QR code for Replays - easily share and explore Replays and apply them to your edits!
• New Effects in the Paper category.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

What’s new for Gold Subscribers?
• New Halloween fonts!
• New font packages, including Cyrillic Fonts, Sprite Graffiti, and more.
Bug fixes! Bug fixes! Bug fixes galore!
Bug Fixes and Performance Updates
Bug Fixes and Performance Updates

Fall has ended, but our updates never stop, and for our Video Editor, you asked for it and here it is! This update includes:
•   Next-gen Video Editor - now you can add music to your video edits from a large collection of license-free music tracks. The new timeline feature lets you add multiple video tracks, and edit them simultaneously. We’ve also added multiple other functionalities, such as Trim, Split, and more.
•   Wrinkle Removal for Beautify - easily remove wrinkles for a fresher look.
•   Eye Bag Removal for Beautify - remove any black circles under your eyes.
•   Dust masks - a whole new category of masks, with a fresh take on the classic vintage look.
•   Bug fixes and optimization.

The holidays are fast approaching, so here’s a small update to tide things over, till the New Year festivities truly kick in:
• Textured colors for Sketch Effects - SKTCH1 and SKTCH2 just received gradient, glitter, space, and other textures as an option for sketch line colors.

Get all snug and cozy next to a fireplace and enjoy our latest update. This one includes:
• Collage support for Replay - now you can enable Replay for your collage edits. You can also apply other users’ Collage Replays to your own edits.
• Blend Modes for Shape Mask - added all blending modes to the Shape Mask tool.
• Bug fixes and improvements.

A new minor update to tide you over, this update includes:
• BRNZ3 - a new bronze vintage effect in the FLTR category.
• Replay – a complete overhaul of the UI in Replay. The new and improved UI provides much more control and functionality when applying Replays to your photos.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug Fixes and Performance Updates

A minor update this time, containing couple of new additions, including:
• Film3 – a new filter in the FX category to transform all your photos to that iconic polaroid look. 
• VNYL1 & VNYL2 – two new filters in the FLTR category for a classic vintage look.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Mad March is here and so is our new update. Here’s what’s in store for you:
• VNYL3 – the third effect in the VNYL series for the FLTR category.
• Callout – new customizable iMessage speech bubbles in the Callout tool.
Bug Fixes and Performance Updates

A new update with a couple of additions to help pass the time and #createfromhome. This update includes:
• Canvas – a new category of effects. This brand new addition comes with four different effects, each adding a small touch of history to your portraits.
• Editor – now you can save your ongoing edits as drafts when closing the editor and return to them at a later date.

New additions in our latest update for you to #stayINspired. Here’s what’s in store:
• Shadow – a new feature that allows you to add shadow backdrops when adding new objects (stickers, photos, texts) and using Fit.
• Video Editor – 50 new music tracks across multiple categories.
• BRL – a new filter in the FLTR category for a subtle layer of smooth brilliance.

New additions in our latest update for you to #stayINspired. Here’s what’s in store:
• Shadow – a new feature that allows you to add shadow backdrops when adding new objects (stickers, photos, texts) and using Fit.
• Video Editor – 50 new music tracks across multiple categories.
• BRL – a new filter in the FLTR category for a subtle layer of smooth brilliance.
Take full control of the lighting in your photos with this update. With the brand new Relight tool you can reposition and adjust the light source to perfect your selfies.
Take full control of the lighting in your photos with this update. With the brand new Relight tool you can reposition and adjust the light source to perfect your selfies.

This update adds the new Styles feature to the Text tool, a brand new filter, and major new additions to the Video Editor just in time for your next big video project: 
• Video Editor – now you can record the movement of different objects in your videos and animate them in real-time using the brand new Animation tool.
• Video Editor – adjust the hue, saturation, and lighting of each individual color in your video with the brand new HSL tool.
• Video Editor – the new Import feature lets you add the exact audio tracks you need to your video edits. Import any audio track you want and give your videos the sound you always wanted.
• Text tool – use the new Styles feature and give your texts the style up they deserve. Select from a large collection of unique text styles and express yourself like never before. 
• VHS3 – the third addition to our fan-favorite VHS line of filters. Give any photo a healthy dose of video cassette goodness, for that classic 80’s home movie aesthetic.

This update adds the new Styles feature to the Text tool, a brand new filter, and major new additions to the Video Editor just in time for your next big video project: 
• Video Editor – now you can record the movement of different objects in your videos and animate them in real-time using the brand new Animation tool.
• Video Editor – adjust the hue, saturation, and lighting of each individual color in your video with the brand new HSL tool.
• Video Editor – the new Import feature lets you add the exact audio tracks you need to your video edits. Import any audio track you want and give your videos the sound you always wanted.
• Text tool – use the new Styles feature and give your texts the style up they deserve. Select from a large collection of unique text styles and express yourself like never before. 
• VHS3 – the third addition to our fan-favorite VHS line of filters. Give any photo a healthy dose of video cassette goodness, for that classic 80’s home movie aesthetic.

Yes, it’s true, Picsart has had some work done. Want to see what’s new? Download the latest update and start creating at the speed of culture.
The only thing better than one sticker is more stickers! Now, whenever you use one, we’ll show you an entire collection of similar stickers to help you find more of what you like.
Yes, it’s true, Picsart has had some work done. Want to see what’s new? Download the latest update and start creating at the speed of culture.
Yes, it’s true, Picsart has had some work done. Want to see what’s new? Download the latest update and start creating at the speed of culture.
The only thing better than one sticker is more stickers! Now, whenever you use one, we’ll show you an entire collection of similar stickers to help you find more of what you like.
The only thing better than one sticker is more stickers! Now, whenever you use one, we’ll show you an entire collection of similar stickers to help you find more of what you like.

A major overhaul to the Drawing tool with this update. Check the amazing redesign for yourself and you’ll start applying your strokes of genius in no time. This update includes  two things:
- Drawing tool – a complete redesign for a much better user experience.
- Drawing tool – a new and improved Text Brush experience. Now you can apply every font in Picsart using the Text Brush.
Minor bugs? We’ve fixed them. So stop reading this and get back to creating and designing your next master work.
This update contains Transitions for the Video Editor. A bunch of new creative effects to apply to your videos. Use these epic new transitions to spice up your video cuts in true Picsart fashion.

This update contains Transitions for the Video Editor, bug fixes and improvements. A bunch of new creative effects to apply to your videos. Use these epic new transitions to spice up your video cuts in true Picsart fashion.

This update contains Transitions for the Video Editor, bug fixes and improvements. A bunch of new creative effects to apply to your videos. Use these epic new transitions to spice up your video cuts in true Picsart fashion.

Creating the perfect edit just got one step shorter with expanded export options. This update also includes three brand new filters  that will seriously change your black and white game:
-Black and white “monochrome” filters just got a new home. From now on you’ll find all of them in their own separate category – B&W.
-SLVR – three fresh filters for the new B&W category. If you’re looking for monochrome filters that are extra sharp, then look no further.
-Our brand new expanded export options lets you select from three export options, PNG, JPG, and PDF. You can also fine-tune the dimensions and quality of your edits when exporting.

Creating the perfect edit just got one step shorter with expanded export options. This update also includes three brand new filters  that will seriously change your black and white game:
-Black and white “monochrome” filters just got a new home. From now on you’ll find all of them in their own separate category – B&W.
-SLVR – three fresh filters for the new B&W category. If you’re looking for monochrome filters that are extra sharp, then look no further.
-Our brand new expanded export options lets you select from three export options, PNG, JPG, and PDF. You can also fine tune the dimensions and quality of your edits when exporting.

It’s been a while since we added some new Masks to Picsart huh? Well, we took care of that. You also wanted applying textures and colors to be easier and smarter. So we did that too. This update includes:
Draw – now you can give your screen a single tap and quickly fill areas with colors and textures with our brand new Bucket Fill tool.
Mask – aiming for that classic folded paper y2k aesthetic? Score that look in no time with the new FOLD masks.

It’s been a while since we added some new Masks to Picsart huh? Well, we took care of that. You also wanted applying textures and colors to be easier and smarter. So we did that too. This update includes:
Draw – now you can give your screen a single tap and quickly fill areas with colors and textures with our brand new Bucket Fill tool.
Mask – aiming for that classic folded paper y2k aesthetic? Score that look in no time with the new FOLD masks.

I think we can all agree the timeline bar in the Video Editor is pretty great. But what if you could multiply the single bar into multiple layers? Sounds pretty cool right? Well, short story, it’s out. Yep, you can use multiple layers now when editing videos. Go nuts.

I think we can all agree the timeline bar in the Video Editor is pretty great. But what if you could multiply the single bar into multiple layers? Sounds pretty cool right? Well, short story, it’s out. Yep, you can use multiple layers now when editing videos. Go nuts.

I know we’ve only just released the Bucket Fill tool like two updates ago, but our illustrators have already added ELEVEN new textures ready for your next design. Yes. Eleven.
Also, did you say text formatting?? No? Well, anyway, it’s actually live right now. You won’t quite be able to write your Art History 101 essay with Picsart just yet (as cool as that sounds) but, you have 10 new formatting options and that’s a win for everyone. Definitely check out the new Format feature for the Text tool, it’s pretty cool.

And if you’ve ever thought to yourself, “you know what Picsart’s missing? A fourth way to remove backgrounds.” Then congrats to you, we’ve added a fourth way to remove backgrounds. Now whenever you add a new photo, you’ll get quick access to the brand new Remove BG tool, that lets you do just that.

You’re kicking off a fresh new edit. You add your stickers and texts. Now all you need is that specific filter you used that one time, to knock the whole thing out of the park. Except, you have no idea where it is. FLTR? FX? Magic? What do those even mean?

Well, the good news is, we’ve done a complete pass over all our effect categories and moved some things around. Now there are less categories overall, and we’ve put all our existing effects in categories that make much more sense now. 

It might take you a couple of minutes to get used to the whole thing, but it’ll make things a lot smoother going forward.

It might take you a couple of minutes to get used to the whole thing, but it’ll make things a lot smoother going forward.

We’ve got a whole bunch of new text styles out with this update! These new additions are especially a treat if you’re just starting a new business, establishing your brand, or organizing an event. Just head over to the Text tool, type in the name of your brand or event, then hit Styles for some seriously cool visuals for your texts.

We’ve got a whole bunch of new text styles out with this update! These new additions are especially a treat if you’re just starting a new business, establishing your brand, or organizing an event. Just head over to the Text tool, type in the name of your brand or event, then hit Styles for some seriously cool visuals for your texts.

We’ve got a whole bunch of new text styles out with this update! These new additions are especially a treat if you’re just starting a new business, establishing your brand, or organizing an event. Just head over to the Text tool, type in the name of your brand or event, then hit Styles for some seriously cool visuals for your texts.

Did you know our video editor has an AI Music feature? It literally conjures license-free music tracks for your videos out of thin air. Crazy right? Well, if you’ve ever tried it before and thought it needed to take just one more step to awesomeness. We just took it. Now we’ll save the music tracks you generate, so you can reuse them for multiple projects instead of generating new tracks every time. Plus, you can generate up to ten AI music tracks completely for free.

You’re aiming on going #nofilter but your photo doesn’t quite make the cut?  Just slap one of the brand NTRL1 and NTRL2 filters on it. Not only they’ll enhance your photos, but it’s subtle enough that you can sneak your way past the #nofilter police and you don’t even need a clever caption to explain yourself for it.

It seems like it was only yesterday we gave you remove backgrounds when adding photos. But we’re not stopping there. This update drops the mother of all remove background tools! Going forward, not only you’ll find the Remove BG directly in the main toolbar, but you’ll be able to both remove and change your entire design’s background all in one go. Plus a whole host of settings and features that we think will make your editing life a whole lot easier.

It’s been a long time coming, but we just merged the Perspective and Flip/Rotate tools into the Crop tool. You had to jump through some serious hoops before, if you were cropping a photo and decided to flip it halfway through. Well, no more! Now you can do all that without it being a nine-step process for every minor change.

If you’ve been with us for a while and you enjoy editing videos, this one’s for you. It’s been a good while since we’ve added any exclusive effects for our Video Editor, so we think it’s time we fixed that. Similar to what a certain viceroy once said, now there are two of them. And there are many more yet to come. With a new video effect slotted to drop each week for a few months at least, Video Editor fans have a LOT to look forward to. 
We’ve also revisited our push notifications system. We think it needed some work to bring it up to the standards everyone expects of Picsart. We’ve updated our system and gave the visuals a lift. So expect to see some nifty stuff from us on your home screen in the near future.

Here at Picsart we’re all about providing you with the best tools that will help you tap into your creativity. With this update, we’ve got a whole bunch of new effects that will give you the instant glow up your photos deserve.

Six new effects that will instantly find and sprinkle glitters to the natural highlights of your photos. You can find all six effects in the new Glitter category.

But that’s not all. If you’ve been with us for a while, then you know we celebrate seasonal holidays in style. Your winter holiday photos this year are serious contenders to steal the show. We’re adding a whole suite of winter themed assets to let you nail that perfect winter vibe in just a few steps. All new backgrounds, stickers, and templates. Plus a whole bunch of Replays, so all you have to do is put one of your own photos on one end and get the perfect holiday photo on the other.

See you all next year!

Well, it's a bit of an uneventful week in terms of releases. So my job is pretty easy this week. The rest of the team is working on some pretty amazing new features, and you'll get access to those soon. But in the meantime, why not pour yourself a glass of water, stretch your legs, or give a loved one a phone call? It'll make you feel great!

The rest of the team is working on some pretty amazing new features, and you'll get access to those soon. But in the meantime, why not pour yourself a glass of water, stretch your legs, or give a loved one a phone call? It'll make you feel great!

Just a quick update this time around. You'd be glad to know that from now on, you don't have to add hashtags anymore when posting your edits. But if you do want to add hashtags, and to make things a little bit easier for you, we'll suggest relevant hashtags based on your edit. All you have to do is select the ones you want from the list and you're good to go! Otherwise, hope all you creators out there are doing well.
